snippet: China’s state-run news media lashed back at critics of a security crackdown in Sichuan Province, that has left several wounded and dead, saying that the actions of police officers were “to defend themselves according to the law.”
abstract: China’s state-run news media lashes back at critics of security crackdown in Sichuan Province, that left several ethnic Tibetans wounded and dead, and defends the actions of police officers.
lead_paragraph: China’s state-run news media lashed back at critics of a security crackdown in Sichuan Province, that has left several wounded and dead, saying that the actions of police officers were “to defend themselves according to the law.”
